prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with bright blue feathers and an elegant dance-like stance.
Imagine a colorful bird Pokemon that can switch forms based on its environment.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon with a mix of flowing ribbons and vibrant plumage.
Make a tropical-themed Pokemon that showcases various colors and has a joyful personality.
Show me a graceful bird Pokemon that can perform amazing aerial acrobatics.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both beauty and agility, perfect for forest habitats.
Give me a unique Pokemon that combines elements of dance and avian features.
